tool_description: Validates completeness and accuracy of shipping and customs documentation against regulatory requirements and carrier standards.

document_type.description: Type of document to validate (shipping_label, customs_form, commercial_invoice, certificate)

document_data.description: Document content or data to validate

destination_country.description: Two-letter ISO country code for destination

error_messages: Unsupported document type: Use one of [shipping_label, customs_form, commercial_invoice, certificate].
Invalid document format: Document data is not in the expected format.
Missing required fields: Document is missing mandatory information for the destination country.
Incorrect validation level: Use one of [basic, standard, strict].
Carrier validation failed: Document does not meet carrier-specific requirements.
Regulatory non-compliance: Document does not meet customs or regulatory standards.
usage: Provide document_type, document_data, and destination_country. Optionally specify carrier for carrier-specific validation and validation_level for strictness. Returns detailed validation results and suggestions.
